items.name: animated-tabs
items.title: Animated Tabs
items.description: A reusable and customizable tabs component built with Radix UI and Motion. Supports smooth sliding highlight animations on tab triggers and fade-in/out transitions for tab content.

items.name: code-block
items.title: Code Block
items.description: A reusable and customizable code block component built with React and Motion.

items.name: music-player
items.title: Music Player
items.description: A customizable music player built with React and Framer Motion, supporting animated transitions and hover effects.

items.name: wave-in-text
items.title: WaveInText
items.description: A fully reusable and customizable text wrapper featuring a smooth, wave-like animation built with React and Framer Motion. Simply wrap your text with this component to bring it to life with fluid, elegant motion.

items.name: roll-in-text
items.title: Text Roll Wrapper
items.description: A fully reusable and customizable text wrapper with a smooth roll-in animation effect. Simply wrap your string with the component and watch the text come to life with motion magic.

items.name: parallax-images
items.title: Parallax Images
items.description: An interactive parallax showcase where images drift in dual lanes, elegantly responding to cursor movement and adding a captivating sense of depth. A recreation from the landonorris website.

items.name: banner-carousal
items.title: Banner Carousal
items.description: An interactive parallax showcase where images drift in dual lanes, elegantly responding to cursor movement and adding a captivating sense of depth. A recreation from the landonorris website.
